entry.name: odd
entry.title: :odd Selector
entry.desc: Selects odd elements, zero-indexed. See also :even.

div.p: As of jQuery 3.4, the :odd pseudo-class is deprecated. Remove it from your selectors and filter the results later using .odd() (available in jQuery 3.5.0 or newer).

longdesc.p: In particular, note that the 0-based indexing means that, counter-intuitively, :odd selects the second element, fourth element, and so on within the matched set.

example.desc: Finds odd table rows, matching the second, fourth and so on (index 1, 3, 5 etc.).
